txt.en: You tell Gwynna the tale of Gerebert Took, who had an unfortunate habit of sneaking onto waggons, one of which journeyed a very long way into these southern lands. Gwynna looks thoughtful when you speak of the robed man Gerebert described to you. 'I think that man may have been Saruman!' he exclaims, and you say that seems possible.
Other hobbits have come this way.
